resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103091</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103091</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085898</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Consider the source</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrachten Sie die Quelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Considérez la source</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Considere a fonte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consideri la sorgente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξετάστε την πηγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Considere la fuente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information is everywhere -- especially in the presence of the Internet. It's hard enough for adults to make sure that information is valid, but it's even harder for students to make that judgment. Here are some suggestions for helping students learn to recognize bad information when they see it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen sind überall -- besonders in 
Anwesenheit des Internets. Es ist stark genug, damit Erwachsene 
überprüfen, ob Informationen gültig sind, aber es ist sogar härter
für Kursteilnehmer, dieses Urteil zu bilden. Sind hier einige 
Vorschläge für das Helfen der Kursteilnehmer erlernen, falsche 
Informationen zu erkennen, wenn sie es sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information est partout -- particulièrement en 
présence de l'Internet. Elle est assez dur pour que les adultes
s'assurent que l'information est valide, mais il est encore plus 
difficile que les étudiants fassent ce jugement. Voici quelques
suggestions pour aider des étudiants apprennent à identifier la 
mauvaise information quand elles le voient.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A informação está em toda parte -- especial na 
presença do Internet. É duramente bastante para que os adultos
certifiquem-se de que a informação é válida, mas é mesmo mais 
duro para estudantes fazer esse julgamento. Estão aqui algumas 
sugestões para ajudar a estudantes aprendem reconhecer a informação
má quando o vêem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sono dappertutto -- 
particolarmente in presenza del Internet. Sono abbastanza duro 
affinchè gli adulti si assicurino che le informazioni sono valide, ma
per gli allievi è ancora più duro fare quel giudizio. Qui sono
alcuni suggerimenti per l'assistenza degli allievi imparano 
riconoscere le informazioni difettose quando lo vedono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πληροφορίες είναι παντού -- ειδικά παρουσία του 
Διαδικτύου. Πρόκειται αρκετά σκληρά για τους ενηλίκους να 
σιγουρευτεί ότι οι πληροφορίες ισχύουν, αλλά είναι ακόμα 
σκληρότερο για τους σπουδαστές να κάνουν εκείνη την κρίση. 
Εδώ είναι μερικές προτάσεις για τους σπουδαστές να μάθουν 
να αναγνωρίζουν τις κακές πληροφορίες όταν τις βλέπουνε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La información está por todas partes -- 
especialmente en la presencia del Internet. Está difícilmente 
bastante para que los adultos se cercioren de que la información es 
válida, pero es incluso más duro que los estudiantes hagan ese 
juicio. Aquí están algunas sugerencias para ayudar a 
estudiantes aprenden reconocer la mala información cuando lo 
consideran.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BOBBY HOBGOOD
FN:BOBBY HOBGOOD
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085898</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103091</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/consider-the-source</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
